review: This gift was given to my significant other for his birthday from my kids.  It is AWESOME!!!! In fact my teenage son loves it so much he asked for one for Christmas.  We stream nextflix off of our android phones NO PROBLEM!!!I will be buying one for my son soon!  If you were considering buying ~ do it, you won't be disappointed. :)
author: Heather B

review: This product is AWESOME.  It was literally as easy as plugging it in and it worked- no difficulties.It does a great job streaming whatever is on my Chrome browser to my TV.I'd strongly recommend it to anyone remotely considering streaming TV options and for a 1 time payment of $35 it far exceeds the monthly streaming choices.
author: Mark T. Long "ML"

review: Chromecast only worked on Netflix or youtube, both of which are already preloaded on my TV.  If you try to view a video clip from chrome or a old episode from hulu, it only sends video, not sound.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Super simple to use and set up, and can quickly turn your phone or tablet into a remote with the Chromecast app.
author: Amazon Customer

review: The device works great. The HDMI extender included with the product helps with internet signal but the device can have signal issues if your TV's HDMI connection is located in an area of your TV that is covered by wires. This is an easy fix with a longer HDMI extension cord so that you can move the device to the top of the rear of the TV to gain better signal.
author: A.M.

review: Really smooth experience. Setup is quick and simple, and then the YouTube app on Android just works with it. Easy for multiple people to join in, adding things to the queue. I've used it several times for watching YouTube with friends and family, or for queueing up background music while we're playing games.
author: Braden Shepherdson

review: This is an inexpensive TV device.It is not a Roku or Apple TV -- its a bit more limited.You can "throw" videos from your iPhone or Android or PC.This works well for Youtube & Netflix apps -- you have to work-around for getting Plex, etc streamed.The Chrome browser extension will send a tab to the TV - so thats what you have to use for the other videos.I hope Google opens up the development ... else, its simply OK for the price.
author: Joe Judge

review: Setup was easy and it works so well with the Netflix app on my iPhone and iPad.  The only downside is that there are only a handful of apps that work with it.  I would love it if they can integrate it with providers of free content, especially NBC and ABC apps.
author: mb10567

review: Google makes it so its perfect!!!Ok fan boy jokes aside this is a great product.Pros:SUPER easy setup.Super easy use.Chrome browser streaming allows you to stream other video sources that do not have a Chromecast app. (plex server, other movie sources)Super cheapCons:Gets VERY hot when plugged in. It really bothers me with how hot this thing gets. Heat is the big killer of electronics and with as much extended use as this device is going to get I really worry that it is going to burn out.Lack of apps/lack of development kit at launch. I understand that Google is working with other sources on apps but there really needs to be a public development kit available so that other programs can get chromecast support. (VLC, winamp, PLEX, even itunes maybe)
author: andrew

review: The Chromecast teamed with my Serviio media server lets me do almost everything I could want to do.  I'll be buying 2 more here shortly.
author: Curtis
